critter.name: Flea
critter.desc: Fleas are tiny insects that feed on blood from humans and animals, which then results in an itchy rash. They use their piercing mouths to suck blood while injecting saliva into their host at the same time. Unlike mosquitoes, both males and females suck blood. The females are larger than the males.
critter.quote: I caught a flea! The curse is lifted.
